trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Cambridge
There was one other sighting in Cambridge on or around March 20th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I was sitting on my porch at around 8:35 today (March 19) looking at the stars when I noticed something in the sky. It didn t look like an aircraft. It had several lights on it, changing to different colours. As I stared at it wondering what it was I noticed that it was really quiet around me. About two minutes into my observation, the silence was broken by some sort of wierd humming sound, followed by a higher pitched "loo" sound. It stayed there for what seemed like an hour, and then left. When I went to tell my wife, she said I had only been out for about four minutes. I m really disturbed by this and I am wondering what exactly this was.
